overview: A philosophical burlesque, Human Nature follows the ups and downs of an obsessive scientist, a female naturalist, and the man they discover, born and raised in the wild. As scientist Nathan trains the wild man, Puff, in the ways of the world - starting with table manners - Nathan's lover Lila fights to preserve the man's simian past, which represents a freedom enviable to most.
tagline: In the Interest of Civilization … Conform.
cast: Tim Robbins|Patricia Arquette|Rhys Ifans|Miranda Otto|Robert Forster
